moves.1. e4: My first e4 opening in ages.
moves.11... Bg4: His first mistake. I see a fork in the road!
moves.12. f3 Bxd4+ 13. cxd4: Isolated pawn but I'll take the Bishop for it.
I'm ahead so I'll exchange for a lead in the end game. His knight has to capture and I win b7.
Ouch, he fell for the poison pawn.
moves.22. Rf2: And no way to save another piece so he resigned.
